com.vgrs.xcode.common
Class UnicodeTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.vgrs.xcode.common.UnicodeTokenizer
public class UnicodeTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object

Allows tokenization of an array of integer primitives. Functionality emulates the StringTokenizer object.

Constructor Summary
UnicodeTokenizer(int[] input, int[] delimiters, boolean returnDelims)
          Construct a unicode tokenizer for the specified unicode.
 
Method Summary
 boolean hasMoreTokens()
          Emulate StringTokenizer's hasMoreElements method

Constructor Detail

UnicodeTokenizer

public UnicodeTokenizer(int[] input,
                        int[] delimiters,

Construct a unicode tokenizer for the specified unicode.
Parameters:
input - a unicode to be parsed
delimiters - delimiters
returnDelims - flag to indicate if to return delimiter as token
